title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.19 - Records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 50.19 - Records

State Regulations

Each person who possesses a registered laser shall maintain
accurate and complete written records which shall be kept available for
examination by the commissioner. Such records shall be kept of the
following: (a) The results of each
required initial laser output check and system interlock check. (b) Each transfer, receipt and disposal of
any registered laser. (c) Annual
inventories, safety eyewear checks and equipment measurements obtained in
accordance with the required surveys and instrumentation checks listed in
section
50.16
of this Part
(rule). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
50.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
